parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Middle - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
Apparently a primary word; foreign; by implication, a guest or entertainer.
